name: Repicoks Legacy: Crimson Dragons Awakening
description:
Crimson Dragons Awakening is a black and white game that lets you play 20 different characters. Whenever you die you will be resurected as one of the other characters at random until all of them are dead. Characters come in 7 different classes, and while you can die on a mission, you might kill a character to force a reroll and hope for a different class. When you die you will only losse the equiped equipment, so  you can store weapons and armors you aren't using for your resurected characters.  You can also try to explore the world on your own and try to find equipment for all the classes.

The main goal of the game is to help your friend Salazar, a master sorcerer, to find a dragon whose blood is circulating trough his veins. When you are reborn, Salazar will already wait for you in his house, so you can go adventure together once again. This game introduces Gonda, the Crimson Dragon and the last member of the Crimson Bloodline, together with Crimson Fox, Melisa introduced Stirna, one of my previous games and reapearing sorcerer Salazar, the Crimson Flame. 

Crimson Dragons Awakening was released as a part of 44 Day RPG Maker Game Jam - Summer 2022.

The web version only available durning the jam rating period.

Due to the length of the game, witch depends on your playstile, we recomend downloading the game, to prevent any loss of save files.
